p: Powdered freeze-dried tofu [ 18], a source of soy protein, was purchased from Misuzu Corporation Co., Ltd. (Nagano, Japan). It contained 50.3 g/100 g protein and 34.4 g/100 g fat. Tuna-derived fish oil was purchased from NOF Corporation (Tokyo, Japan). Soybean oil and casein were purchased from Wako Pure Chemical Industries (Osaka, Japan). The crude protein content of casein was 88.7 g/100 g. The fatty acid compositions of soybean oil and fish oil were shown in S1 Table.
